title: Can someone do me a private tarot reading here? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a clever person once said: It's hard to predict anything, especially about the future! The fortune teller, the medium, the psychic, the Tarot reader, etc, is very skilled people, who catch instinctively and with great skill the client's signals, through all the small-talk that occurs within the actual seance, where the "reader" with special words and phrases has enticed the client to say what "the reader" "need to know about what the client wants for the seance. Think above this: If anyone was able to predict anything at all, the psycics, the fortune tellers, etc.. would of course bet on betting, and get very rich, instead of living on the relatively small amounts from the clients. If the client ask to money or death: Is the explanation generally: The spirits we contacts, always refuses to accept that I/we ask questions about money and death. But note: The somewhat strange result of a prediction said by a clairvoyant, or an astrologer, is incredible often, that a client, now more or less subconsciously, focuses all her/his energy on the prediction to come true. - - - The above as well as coincidences are the main reasons why people believe in predictions!

Well, I don't claim to be psychic and I'll skip private and I'll give you a three card reading because I'm too lazy to do a Tree of Life tonight. PAST: 4 of Pentacles: Stability, solidity, wealth PRESENT: 7 of Cups reversed: Disillusionment, realization FUTURE: 6 of Cups reversed: Retirement, ending Overall: You are comfortably well off. You've seen through the lies told to you and you'll break off that relationship. BS: Make that seen through the lies of psychics and fortunetellers and will end this experiment.

I think it is hard to make a public format like this a private consultation but I am happy to tell you whatever you want to hear and I will not ask for a fee. 1 Write down about ten things you want and lay them around a circle. 2 get a carrot and find the central point and thread a piece of fishing line through it at the centre point. 3 Spin the carrot over the top of your choices and whatever one it stops at, that will be your choice. If you do this in the wind you might find the carrot will not stabilize. If you don’t like the choice the magic carrot made, you pick the next closest outcome. If you don't like this carrot Tarot you could eat the carrot. The same trick works with an arrow as it rhymes with tarrow but the arrow is not edible.

upvoters.user_id: Institute of Performing Art Mind Power Development

response.answer_text: You’re your own best reader, if you think about it. All Tarot does is give you a set of highly charged random images. What a good reader does is to guide you into doing your own reading, pulling up associations from your subconscious. A bad reader will try to flatter, trick or threaten you. If you don’t have cards, you can have your cards dealt for you at facade.org or the Sacred Text Archive. Besides, do you really want to do this “in public”?

FB has groups where people are learning and will do it for free. But if you want someone who knows their stuff… Search for a local reader, and they should also be able to do it on the phone. There’s also readers on YT that do live readings. I have a friend who does this as her full time job, but make sure you bond and like the reader. A cheap reading is a cheap reading for a reason, including free.

Yes, the cards say you will live be long, prosperous life. That will be $50 For an additional $25, you may have a great romantic life. We accept PayPal and Mastercard. If you fail to pay, all your children will be born naked.
Sure. Feel free to message me. I don’t charge and I do them via google meet, discord, or element.
I offer those services. All of my information is in my bio. Please feel free to find my email and contact me there. I look forward to speaking with you.

If you want a reading from me yes. But I do ask for money. if you’re interested contact me in private for more informations. there are tons of psychics, tarot readers out there that do free readings or are the same as me. I wish you good luck.
There are so many people who are doing this and you can search in Google for both services online or private (with professional charges).you can also go through their website for confirmation.

author_info.name: Manda Ashley Tarot Reader and Pet Psychic

response.answer_text: I do private readings but I don’t do them here appointments are made through my website and scheduled once payment and services agreement is signed

There is a lot tarot card readings on YouTube. You can watch to see which reader has reading that mostly resonate with your questions. Then choose that reader. Tip: accuracy and fees don't equate, though they could be.
If you can pm your birthdate and the birthdate of the person you want to enquire about, I’ll give you a tarot and Astrological/Numerology reading for free.
